about: I'm a normal, 9-5 professional that also loves to spend his spare time making quality sound recordings. Check out my tutorials and sound effects videos on youtube and support me on Patreon if maybe I've saved your bacon and you want to show me some love. Plus, all of my sounds here will always be completely free, no strings, no attribution, just free. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq1FV79pJLa8sxcbZ3tAYrg https://www.patreon.com/saturdaysoundguy https://www.facebook.com/saturdaysoundguy
